message:
I always get lost in different screens. DISCOVER?! You have to change that name to something more specific. You might have as well called it "DO"..

I get this nagware about how I am not in a Social Network . What r u ppl peddling facebook?!?

Just make life easier for me and give me a way to go through groups without clicking on DISCOVER and then on one of the 3-4 tiny links in top left. @##$@#!!!
(props to anybody who gets the reference.)
props to anybody who uses a const reference
